This folder contains libraries and binaries needed by Eva.
antlr-3.4.jar 	- ANTLR compiler which is invoked by the makefiles to create Lexer, Parser and TreeWalker for Eva.
Lib
  antlr3cd.lib 	- ANTLR C runtime library which used by Eva
  mpir.lib 		- MPIR library for big number operations
Include 		- Contains include files for ANTLR and MPIR libraries.
